languages.text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

traits.locale_text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers damage, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage isn't prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

languages.text:
装备者在战斗开始时，获得3层“全息投影”效果。每当装备者承受{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，失去1层“全息投影”效果，承受的伤害降至0点。
当装备者失去所有“全息投影”层数之后，阻挡伤害的效果消失，且装备者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

traits.locale_text:
装备者在战斗开始时，获得3层“全息投影”效果。每当装备者承受伤害时，失去1层“全息投影”效果，承受的伤害降至0点。
当装备者失去所有“全息投影”层数之后，阻挡伤害的效果消失，且装备者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
В начале боя персонаж получает 3 заряда голополя. Каждый заряд позволяет игнорировать получение {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, после чего заряд пропадает.
Когда заряды заканчиваются, получение урона не предотвращается, а персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} до конца боя.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

traits.locale_text:
В начале боя персонаж получает 3 заряда голополя. Каждый заряд позволяет игнорировать получение урона, после чего заряд пропадает.
Когда заряды заканчиваются, получение урона не предотвращается, а персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} до конца боя.

В начале боя персонаж получает 3 заряда голополя. Каждый заряд позволяет игнорировать получение урона, после чего заряд пропадает.
Когда заряды заканчиваются, получение урона не предотвращается, а персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлен{/g} до конца боя.

languages.text:
使用者は、戦闘開始時にホロフィールドを3チャージ獲得する。使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるたびに、このダメージを防ぐためにホロフィールドの1チャージが取り除かれる。
残りのチャージがない場合、ダメージは防ぐことができず、使用者は戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ状態{/g}となる。
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

traits.locale_text:
使用者は、戦闘開始時にホロフィールドを3チャージ獲得する。使用者がダメージを受けるたび、このダメージを防ぐためにホロフィールドの1チャージが取り除かれる。
チャージが残っていない場合、ダメージを防ぐことができず、使用者は戦闘終了時まで{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態となる。

languages.text:
El portador obtiene 3 cargas de un campo holográfico al comienzo del combate. Cada vez que el portador recibe {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, se elimina 1 carga de campo holográfico para evitar el daño.
Si no quedan cargas, el daño no se evita y el portador queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} hasta que termine el combate.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

traits.locale_text:
El portador obtiene 3 cargas de un campo holográfico al comienzo del combate. Cada vez que el portador recibe daño, se elimina 1 carga de campo holográfico para evitar el daño.
Si no quedan cargas, el daño no se evita y el portador queda {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} hasta que termine el combate.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält zu Beginn des Kampfes 3 Ladungen eines Holofeldes. Erleidet der Träger Schaden, wird 1 Ladung des Holofeldes entfernt, um diesen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu vermeiden.
Sind keine Ladungen mehr übrig, wird der Schaden nicht vermieden und der Träger wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g} belegt.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält zu Beginn des Kampfes 3 Ladungen eines Holofelds. Immer wenn der Träger Schaden erleidet, wird 1 Ladung des Holofelds entfernt, um diesen Schaden zu vermeiden.
Sind keine Ladungen mehr übrig, wird der Schaden nicht vermieden und der Träger wird bis zum Ende des Kampfes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur obtient 3 charges d'holo-champ au début du combat. Chaque fois qu'il subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, il utilise 1 charge d'holo-champ pour s'en prémunir.
Une fois à court de charges, il ne peut plus se prémunir des dégâts et subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text:
The wielder gains 3 charges of a holo-field at the start of combat. Whenever the wielder suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, 1 charge of the holo-field is removed to prevent this damage.
If there are no charges left, damage is not prevented and the wielder becomes {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g} until the end of combat

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur obtient 3 charges d'holo-champ au début du combat. Chaque fois qu'il subit des dégâts, il utilise 1 charge d'holo-champ pour s'en prémunir.
Une fois à court de charges, il ne peut plus se prémunir des dégâts et subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.

L'utilisateur obtient 3 charges d'holo-champ au début du combat. Chaque fois qu'il subit des dégâts, il utilise 1 charge d'holo-champ pour s'en prémunir.
Une fois à court de charges, il ne peut plus se prémunir des dégâts et subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} jusqu'à la fin du combat.
